name: Jelly Bubble Crush
description:
Jelly Bubble Crush is a most exciting connect Jelly bubbles game.

swipe you finger to connect Jelly with the same Jelly, every level you have Different seconds & Target to crush bubble,reach the target and go next level.

Features:
=> Colorful Jelly bubbles.
=> Easy to learn, but hard to master.
=> props to help you get more points.
=> 25 Levels With Different Target
=> Cool Sounds

How to play:
1. Line two or more Jelly bubbles to make them crush.
2. Line 6 or more bubbles will get prop.
3. More Jelly more points.

Play the Jelly Bubble Crush game and challenge with your friends.
